title: Amazon | SDE2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 3 College (Bachelor's) --> Tier 1 College (Master's)
Years of Experience: Almost 3 years
Prior Experience: Microsoft as a contractor, Cisco as an FTE
Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Bangalore
Previous Salary: USD 42k (equivalent to ~INR 35,00,000)
Salary: INR 42,00,000
Bonuses: INR 19,00,000 (1st year) + INR 15,00,000 (2nd year)
Relocation - INR 1,50,000
Stock bonus: ~ 310 units vesting over 4 years (as per Amazon's standard RSU plan 5/15/40/40)
Total comp for 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 65,00,000
Total comp for 2nd year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 66,00,000
Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits
Other details: Accepted the offer since Walmart weren't able to match it. Not sure if I could have negotiated more, but I was pretty happy with the offer nevertheless.
Interview Experience detailed [here](https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5804317/Amazon-or-SDE2-or-Bangalore-or-Sep-2024-Offer)
